ToUpperString

This component converts the string input [In] to uppercase when triggered by the input event.

Ports

  • [In] :

    Data input.

  • [Out] :

    Data output, the string input [In] converted to uppercase.

  • [In] :

    Input event.

  • [Out] :

    Output event.

Parameters

None.

State Machine

Stateless.

Profiles

All.

Toolbox

Core.

Version

v2.1.

Native Dependencies

  • TDK1.1:

Licence Type

LGPL.

Component Supplier

inx ltd.
